headline: Silicon Skyline: Tech Hub Rises In Manhattan
abstract: Amazon, Apple, Facebook and Google will soon have 20,000 workers in New York City, many in offices on the West Side.
lead_paragraph: When Facebook was searching for another New York office, one big enough to fit as many as 6,000 workers, more than double the number it currently employs in the city, it had one major demand: It needed the space urgently.
